scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:sign && npm run deploy:send
scripts.deploy:sign: gcloud beta functions deploy thumb-sign --env-vars-file .env.sign.yaml --trigger-http --entry-point sign --runtime=nodejs8 --region=europe-west1
scripts.deploy:send: gcloud beta functions deploy thumb-send --env-vars-file .env.send.yaml --trigger-http --entry-point send --runtime=nodejs8 --region=europe-west1
